item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Happy birthday Matthew!! I hope that you have a relaxed day and that work doesn't get in the way too much!! I'll give you a call tonight.</p>
item.content:encoded: Happy birthday Matthew!! I hope that you have a relaxed day and that work doesn’t get in the way too much!! I’ll give you a call tonight.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>It looks interesting but will I be deluged if I take part? Changing the subject completely - as mums are allowed to do - HAPPY BIRTHDAY for 23rd and have a good day!!</p>
item.content:encoded: It looks interesting but will I be deluged if I take part? Changing the subject completely – as mums are allowed to do – HAPPY BIRTHDAY for 23rd and have a good day!!
